channel.title: Timers that show up on your screen?
channel.description: hey im trying to make a timer that will show up on my screen ,the tutorial on timers is command based, this is what i want. [code](sendframe126 "Time until the next game starts:"+sometimer, #####)[/code] sumthing like that^
